description.narrative: Local government and community capacity for sustainable environment management of a clean cookstove and fuel project is increased and further disseminated in the district: Health benefits for better indoor air mainly for women and children. Addresses user needs for energy needs and environment protection: Social, resource, income and behaviour of users in the Koh-e Baba mountain villages. Scalability: Can be up-scaled in the region to the 18 communities in Koh-e Baba and potentially throughout Central Highl ands and beyond. Better performance with an improved cookstove, fuel solution and maintenance regime: Improved technology, design, and performance relative to baseline conditions and have standards for performance and safety.
